mapper.sql: select id, create_user, radius, title, start_time, end_time, description, create_time, update_time from activity
mapper.insert: insert into activity (create_user, radius, title, start_time, end_time, description, create_time, update_time) values (#{createUser}, #{radius}, #{title}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime});
mapper.select: select a.id, u.name as createName, ST_Distance(l.geom::geography, ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(#{longitude}, #{latitude})::geography, 4326)) as distance, a.radius, a.title, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.description from activity a left join location l on a.id = l.activity_id left join "user" u on a.create_user = u.id order by distance
